00012 #ifndef __DCS_EVENT_REPORT_IND_H__
00013 #define __DCS_EVENT_REPORT_IND_H__
00014 
00015 #define MAX_SDK_EVENT_DATA_LENGTH 128
00016 /*
00017  * Structure used to store all Device State change TLV Values.
00018  *
00019  *  \param  TlvPresent - Boolean indicating the presence of the TLV
00020  *                       in the QMI response
00021  *
00022  *  \param  DeviceState - State of the Device
00023  */
00024 struct deviceStateChangeTlv
00025 {
00026     BYTE TlvPresent;
00027     BYTE deviceState;
00028 };
00029 
00030 /*
00031  * Structure used to store all SDK Terminated TLV Values.
00032  *
00033  *  \param  TlvPresent - Boolean indicating the presence of the TLV
00034  *                       in the QMI response
00035  *
00036  *  \param  Data       - Termination eason string
00037  */
00038 struct SDKTerminatedTlv
00039 {
00040     BYTE TlvPresent;
00041     BYTE Data[MAX_SDK_EVENT_DATA_LENGTH];
00042 };
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * eQMI_DCS_EVENT_REPORT_IND TLVs defined below
00046  *
00047  */
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Name:    QmiCbkDcsEventStatusReportInd
00051  *
00052  * Purpose: Structure used to store Device Connectivity notification parameters
00053  *
00054  * Members: DSCTlv - Device State Change Structure
00055  *          SDKTlv - SDK Termination Structure
00056  *
00057  */
00058 struct QmiCbkDcsEventStatusReportInd{
00059      struct deviceStateChangeTlv DSCTlv;
00060      struct SDKTerminatedTlv SDKTlv;
00061 };
